meanings.definition: Relating to electricity or electric currents.
meanings.sent1: The electrical wires carried power to the house.
meanings.sent2: The electrical engineer fixed the circuit.
meanings.sent3: The electrical storm lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an electrical charge, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The electrical shock jolted him awake.

meanings.sent1: The electrical appliances in the kitchen hummed softly.
meanings.sent2: The electrical generator powered the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The electrical toaster popped up the bread with a surprise.
meanings.sent4: His voice was an electrical current that energized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The electrical car silently glided down the road.

meanings.definition: Concerned with the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent1: The electrical circuit was carefully designed to prevent overloads.
meanings.sent2: The electrical panel displayed the power consumption.
meanings.sent3: The electrical dance of electrons fascinated the students.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like an electrical current, sparking new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The electrical current surged through the wires, powering the device.
